title: Death Row Inmate's DNA Testing Depends on Technicality
itunes:title: Death Row Inmate's DNA Testing Depends on Technicality
description:
Jordan Rubin, Bloomberg Law Reporter, discusses a case where, whether a Texas death-row inmate gets DNA testing, will hinge on a technical ruling by the US Supreme Court about statutes of limitations.
Former federal prosecutor Jimmy Gurule, a Professor at Notre Dame Law School, discusses the high stakes seditious conspiracy trial of the Oath Keepers.
June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
